title: Beyond Frame-wise Tracking: A Trajectory-based Paradigm for Efficient Point Cloud Tracking
summary: This paper proposes a novel trajectory-based paradigm for efficient LiDAR-based 3D single object tracking (3D SOT). It addresses the limitations of existing frame-wise and sequence-based methods by incorporating long-term temporal context for robustness in sparse or occluded scenes, while aiming for computational efficiency. The method processes multiple point clouds to gain robustness.
